data.title: GalLenspy: Reconstruction of mass profile in disc-like galaxies from the gravitational lensing effect
data.name: GalLenspy
data.description: This is a open code whose purpose is the reconstruction of mass profile in disc-like galaxies from the gravitational lensing effect.

evidence: "Gallenspy is an open source code created in python, designed for the mass profiles reconstruction in disc-like galaxies using the GLE."
"With the **init_guess_params.txt** file generated, the user can execute the  **source_lens.py** file in the following way: **$ python3 source_lens.py**"
"Finally Gallenspy generate a file denominated **Einstein_radius.txt**, with the value of the Einstein radius and its errors respectively."
